subsection.name: Introduction
subsection.p: This module allows the use of workflow tasks with the [plugin-appointment](https://github.com/lutece-secteur-public/gru-plugin-appointment), providing a way to execute specific actions on appointments.

p.ul:
It makes a direct link between the plugin-appointment and the [plugin-workflow](https://github.com/lutece-platform/lutece-wf-plugin-workflow), allowing us to use the generic tasks available with the later:
(Workflow) Archiving
Comment
Notification
...

subsection.p: Additionally, we can implement our own workflow tasks, specific to appointment resources. This module comes with multiple tasks, as described in the section [Appointment tasks available](#appointment-tasks-available).

subsection.name: Appointment tasks available
subsection.p: This is the list of tasks available with the module-workflow-appointment, their description and their potential configuration requirements:

tr.td: (Workflow) Archiving - Archive appointment

Its configuration offers 2 options to archive appointments (after a given period of time): **1.** Anonymize the appointment's data (user data, form field values, etc.) but keep it **2.** Delete all the appointment's data

subsection.name: Usage
subsection.p: Once the module has been enabled in a Lutece site, its tasks can be added to a workflow's action and then configured, if required.
